column4: so you make one app work differently from the rest ... and that's *good* ?!
it's not about winning
GNOME isn't about beating KDE, it's just about writing a desktop environment some people might like
and those that don't like it can use the other desktop environments that are more suited to their tastes
do one thing, and do it well
not do everything, just to get that one extra user
I get asked a huge amount why I don't make it easier in Debian for people to build the system from source "like Gentoo"
my reply is that if people want to build their system from source, they should *use* Gentoo
hrm, Qt is to KDE as GTK+ is to GNOME
it's just the X toolkit underneath
mostly
not really
yeah, but if you want to unpack .debs without dpkg (like, say, if you rm /usr) you need ar
are you serious? :P
sure.
ar is a good old-fashioned UNIX file format.  Headers are plain text, terminating in a new line :p
yeh :)
thats jus evil :)
nope, it was *designed* so you could do this :p
you can?
| tar xz, wasting space spitting it out :P
